title: Museveni awards Muhoozi Kabalega Star for Somalia operations
desc: President Museveni awards CDF Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba the Kabalega Star Medal during Tarehe Sita celebrations for his role in Somalia, DRC and South Sudan missions.
